mapper.select: SELECT MENU_SEQNO VALUE ,REGEXP_REPLACE(LPAD('-',1*(LEVEL-1)), '', '-')|| DECODE(LEVEL-1,0,'',LEVEL-1 ||'차 메뉴 : ') || MENU_NM KEY FROM SY_MENU WHERE LEVEL != 4 START WITH UPPER_MENU_SEQNO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_SEQNO = UPPER_MENU_SEQNO
SELECT LEVEL VALUE, MENU_NM KEY FROM SY_MENU WHERE LEVEL != 4 START WITH UPPER_MENU_SEQNO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_SEQNO = UPPER_MENU_SEQNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY UPPER_MENU_SEQNO, SORT_ORDR

SELECT MENU_SEQNO VALUE, REGEXP_REPLACE(LPAD('-',1*(LEVEL-1)), ' ','-') || decode(LEVEL-1,0,'',LEVEL-1 ||'차 메뉴 : ') || MENU_NM KEY FROM SY_MENU m WHERE LEVEL = 2 START WITH UPPER_MENU_SEQNO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_SEQNO = UPPER_MENU_SEQNO

SELECT MENU_SEQNO VALUE, REGEXP_REPLACE(LPAD('-',1*(LEVEL-1)), ' ','-') || decode(LEVEL-1,0,'',LEVEL ||'차 메뉴 : ') || MENU_NM KEY FROM SY_MENU m WHERE LEVEL = 2 START WITH MENU_SEQNO = #{menuSeqno} CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_SEQNO = UPPER_MENU_SEQNO
SELECT A.MENU_SEQNO FROM SY_MENU A WHERE A.MENU_URL = #{menuUrl} AND A.USE_AT = 'Y'
SELECT AUTHOR_CODE ,USER_ID ,INQIRE_AUTHOR_AT ,STRE_AUTHOR_AT ,DELETE_AUTHOR_AT ,OUTPT_AUTHOR_AT ,LAST_CHANGER_ID ,LAST_CHANGE_DT FROM SY_AUTHOR_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SY_MENU_BKMK ( USER_ID ,MENU_SEQNO ,LAST_CHANGER_ID ,LAST_CHANGE_DT ) VALUES ( TO_NUMBER() ,#{menuSeqno} , ,SYSDATE )
